mapper.select: select count(*) from users where user_id=#{userId}
select user_id from users where user_name=#{userName} and user_mail=#{userMail}
select user_pwd from users where user_id=#{userId} and user_name=#{userName} and user_mail=#{userMail}
select * from users where user_id=#{userId} and user_pwd=#{userPwd}
mapper.delete: delete from bookmark where order_id=#{orderId} and owner_id=#{ownerId}
mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rnum,a.* from (select b.owner_id,h.home_title from bookmark b, home h where b.owner_id=h.user_id and b.order_id=#{userId}) a where rownum<=#{end}) a2 where rnum>=#{start};

select * from (select rownum rnum,a.* from (select o.order_no,o.order_size,o.order_state,o.order_price from order_statement o, users u,item i where o.item_no=i.item_no and o.user_id=u.user_id and u.user_id=#{userId}) a where rownum<=#{end}) a2 where rnum>=#{start}
mapper.update: update users set user_point=user_point+#{tradePoint} where user_id=#{userId}
update users set user_point=user_point-#{tradePoint} where user_id=#{userId}
update users set user_address=#{userAdrress},user_post=#{userPost},user_mail=#{userMail}, user_phone=#{userPhone} from user_id=#{userId}
update users set enabled=0 from user_id=#{userId}
mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rnum,a.* from (select m.img_name, i.item_name,i.ITEM_PRICE,i.ITEM_INVEN from basket b,item i,item_img m where m.img_no in(select min(img_no) from item_img group by item_no) and b.item_no=i.item_no and b.user_id=#{userId}) a where rownum<=#{end}) a2 where rnum>=#{start}
